message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product for me.  However, I'm looking to spend closer to $9,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product offers you even more value than that.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
